Admissions                                                                                                        NYU.edu requires JavaScript be enabled in your browser in order to use important features of the site. JavaScript is either disabled or not supported by your browser. For instructions on how to enable JavaScript in your browser, click here .                New York University    Skip to Content   Skip to Search   Skip to Sub Navigation              Global Institute of Public Health                       Search NYU                    Pages |    People                                                                Bread Crumbs          Global Institute of Public Health   /   Academic Programs   /   Master of Public Health   /   Admissions                       Sub Navigation                                 How to Apply                       Tuition & Financial Aid                       International Students                       Frequently Asked Questions                       Student Ambassadors                                                                 Admissions       If you're interested in becoming a public health professional, perhaps no decision is more important than where to study your MPH degree.                                   We encourage interested candidates to explore our website and learn first- hand how studying public health at NYU can lead to exciting academic and professional growth and opportunities.   Even if you've already made the decision to apply, we know that you likely have many questions. We've designed this website to answer as many of those questions as possible, and if you can't find the answer to your question here we encourage you to contact us so we can help you learn more.   Whether it's corresponding with one of our student ambassadors , visiting the campus, meeting with faculty or students, or sitting in on a class, we are committed to making sure you understand how you fit in with the NYU MPH community.                                   Fall 2015 applications are only accepted through SOPHAS, the centralized application service for public health schools and programs.     Please visit the SOPHAS website.                               For further details on applying, see     our 2015 application instructions.                                                                                           Access the SOPHAS Application                                                                                             We are still accepting applications for Fall 2015 enrollment to selected concentrations!                     News and Updates     > We are pleased to offer a new concentration in Epidemiology for Fall 2015 applicants.            > Learn more about our new Social and Behavioral Sciences concentration.              Attend an online information session:   May 12, 2015 - RSVP here            NEW: contact our MPH student ambassadors directly to learn more about their firsthand experiences as students in our program.                                                                        Join Our Mailing List                                                            Contact Us                  Need help with your application or have questions about the program?            Email the Office of Admissions                                                          NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map         Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. Master of Public Health                                                                                                        NYU.edu requires JavaScript be enabled in your browser in order to use important features of the site. JavaScript is either disabled or not supported by your browser. For instructions on how to enable JavaScript in your browser, click here .                New York University    Skip to Content   Skip to Search   Skip to Sub Navigation              Global Institute of Public Health                       Search NYU                    Pages |    People                                                                Bread Crumbs          Global Institute of Public Health   /   Academic Programs   /   Master of Public Health                       Sub Navigation                                 About the MPH                       Admissions                       Academics                       Public Health Practice                       Student Resources                       Advanced Certificate in LGBT Health, Education, and Social Services                                                                 Master of Public Health                             At NYU, public health is an academic priority founded upon a longstanding history of scholarship seeking to preserve and improve the health of all people. NYU's strength in public health draws from the robust collaboration taking place across its renowned schools and colleges, fostering a truly interdisciplinary approach to addressing our most pressing global health challenges.
